definition: outstanding/particularly, especially/a fault/to express discontentment against

sentences.english: He thinks most people are " Phonies ", especially adults4.
sentences.chinese: 他认为绝大多数人都是骗子，尤其是大人。

sentences.english: Potassium is particularly important for quality of mandarin oranges.
sentences.chinese: 钾对中同柑的品质的影响尤其突出。

sentences.english: In this historical process, the development orbit of state of Qin especially has model nature.
sentences.chinese: 在这一历史进程中，秦国的发展轨迹尤其具有典型性。

sentences.english: Silvereyes are omnivorous but have a particular fondness for fruit.
sentences.chinese: 灰胸绣眼鸟是杂食性的但是尤其喜爱食用植物的果实。

sentences.english: We're always looking for influence, especially with music.
sentences.chinese: 我们总是在寻找具有影响力的人物，尤其是在乐坛。

sentences.english: Perhaps that's why religious groups are particularly drawn to GTD.
sentences.chinese: 也许正因为如此GTD尤其受到宗教团体的欢迎。

sentences.english: Give me home-cooked food, especially hummus.
sentences.chinese: 我就要家乡菜，尤其是胡姆斯。

sentences.english: Especially in the United States, it's a law that you have to wear your seatbelt.
sentences.chinese: 尤其在美国，法律规定开车时必须系好安全带。

sentences.english: Especially since the game is ten times as customisable.
sentences.chinese: 尤其是在辐射三的开放性还要大十倍的情况下。

sentences.english: In particular, my design employed mock objects to make testing easier.
sentences.chinese: 尤其是，我的设计利用了模仿对象来简化测试。

sentences.english: However, theory and reality don't always match up, especially in the world of software.
sentences.chinese: 然而，理论和现实不总是一致的，尤其在软件世界里。

sentences.english: Yoga is very popular especially in Los Angeles.
sentences.chinese: 瑜伽在洛杉矶尤其流行。

sentences.english: Some experts believe it is excessive intake of dairy foods, especially the cheese-related.
sentences.chinese: 有专家认为它与过多摄入乳类食品，尤其是奶酪有关。

sentences.english: And the slave ship was especially selling his art.
sentences.chinese: 而《贩奴船》则尤其表现了他艺术的成熟。

sentences.english: Local people like to chew it, especially at a wedding.
sentences.chinese: 本地人喜欢嚼槟榔，尤其在婚礼上。

sentences.english: Especially the offshore petroleum industry, which is an industry of relatively high risk.
sentences.chinese: 尤其是海上石油行业，这是一个相对风险性高的行业。

definition: of/~'s (possessive particle)/(used after an attribute)/(used to form a nominal expression)/(used at the end of a declarative sentence for emphasis)
regarding/as far as sth is concerned/with regards to
not only (this one)/not just (...) but also
for the most part/many/most/the greater part/mostly
variant of 是[shi4]/(used in given names)
